plot: Jim Rutledge, a newcomer to the Pecos country. Jim is befriended by Clem Vining, who has been constantly persecuted by the Long Loop gang.
title: The Long Loop on the Pecos
plot_es: Jim Rutledge, a newcomer to the Pecos country. Jim is befriended by Clem Vining, who has been constantly persecuted by the Long Loop gang.
original_name: The Long Loop on the Pecos
plot_en: Jim Rutledge, a newcomer to the Pecos country. Jim is befriended by Clem Vining, who has been constantly persecuted by the Long Loop gang.
